titles.title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 1706 NW 24th Avenue in Portland, Oregon, as the "Vera Katz Post Office".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary:
9/15/2008--Introduced.
Designates the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 1706 NW 24th Avenue in Portland, Oregon, as the "Vera Katz Post Office."
